episodes.synopsis: Bonnie listens to sounds coming from all different places. You'll hear music from a parade, raindrops on a rainy day, street noises and so much more.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Join Bonnie on a musical journey as she hears sounds from a concert hall and a music class. The fun continues with a trip to the garden and more.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie and Mr. Gramophone listen to sounds that can be heard at all kinds of fun places, like the zoo, playground and train station.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Listen with Bonnie as she hears all kinds of things, including sounds you can hear at a rainforest, petting zoo and birthday party.
episodes.title: Episode 4

video.title: Bonnie Bear
video.synopsis: Bonnie Bear explores the world of art by drawing and painting her unique interpretations of music and sounds she hears, often with hilarious results.
